plays.text: Penalty to Shawn Heins 2 minutes for Interference Derek Morris

Penalty to Niklas Sundstrom 2 minutes for Hooking Ronald Petrovicky
Penalty to Mike Rathje 2 minutes for Hooking Jarome Iginla
Goal scored by Owen Nolan assisted by Mike Rathje and Vincent Damphousse
Penalty to Dean McAmmond 2 minutes for Roughing Bryan Marchment
